bioconda.name: pyani
bioconda.summary: pyani provides a package and script for calculation of genome-scale average nucleotide identity.

biocontainers.name: pyani
biocontainers.summary: Pyani provides a package and script for calculation of genome-scale average nucleotide identity.

biotools.summary: pyani is a Python package and standalone program for calculation of whole-genome similarity measures. It is designed to be used with draft or complete prokaryote (bacterial and archaeal) genomes.

bioschemas.name: pyani
bioschemas.summary: pyani is a Python package and standalone program for calculation of whole-genome similarity measures. It is designed to be used with draft or complete prokaryote (bacterial and archaeal) genomes.
